pageProps.data:
## HSVColorConverter

###### Description

Convert RGB color to HSV spave and vice versa,
 [original code](http://lolengine.net/blog/2013/07/27/rgb-to-hsv-in-glsl).

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|The input image|
|**type**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Operation supports two types of conversion: `rgb_to_hsv`, `hsv_to_rgb`.|

###### Example

```js
// this line convert RGB space to HSV
 gm.HSVColor(inputImage, 'rgb_to_hsv');
```
